BlackRuseMod:_DummyAttack.NAME: Attack
BlackRuseMod:_DummyAttack.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, the enemy intends to attack.

BlackRuseMod:_DummyNotAttack.NAME: Not Attack
BlackRuseMod:_DummyNotAttack.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, the enemy does not intend to attack.

BlackRuseMod:InstantArmor.NAME: Instant Armor
BlackRuseMod:InstantArmor.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Protection. NL Convert 3 Knives to Satellites. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:Alleviate.NAME: Alleviate
BlackRuseMod:Alleviate.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to 3 cards. NL Gain !B! Block for each discarded card.

BlackRuseMod:PendulumOfEternity.NAME: Pendulum of Eternity
BlackRuseMod:PendulumOfEternity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Shift: Costs 1 less [B] .

BlackRuseMod:Orbit.NAME: Orbit
BlackRuseMod:Orbit.DESCRIPTION: Convert !M! Knives to Satellites. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each Satellite you have.

BlackRuseMod:Comet.NAME: Comet
BlackRuseMod:Comet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Draw 1 less card for each card you have played this turn.
BlackRuseMod:Comet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Draw 1 less card for each card you have played this turn.

BlackRuseMod:Dilation.NAME: Dilation
BlackRuseMod:Dilation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Protection. NL This card's Protection is increased by 1 this combat.

BlackRuseMod:Moondial.NAME: Moondial
BlackRuseMod:Moondial.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Temporal cards to your hand and your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:Deny.NAME: Deny
BlackRuseMod:Deny.DESCRIPTION: Look at your NL draw pile. NL You may discard NL up to !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
BlackRuseMod:Deny.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Look at your NL draw pile. NL You may discard NL up to !M! cards.

BlackRuseMod:DoubleEdge.NAME: Double Edge
BlackRuseMod:DoubleEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Backlash.

BlackRuseMod:DualDimension.NAME: Dual Dimension
BlackRuseMod:DualDimension.DESCRIPTION: Double your Protection. NL Exhaust. NL Shift: Gain !M! Protection.

BlackRuseMod:Duplication.NAME: Duplication
BlackRuseMod:Duplication.DESCRIPTION: Duplicate !M! card. NL The duplicate NL costs 0 this turn. NL Backlash. NL Exhaust.
BlackRuseMod:Duplication.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Duplicate !M! cards. NL The duplicates NL cost 0 this turn. NL Backlash. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:Embodiment.NAME: Embodiment
BlackRuseMod:Embodiment.DESCRIPTION: At the end your turn, add a random Temporal card to your draw pile.
BlackRuseMod:Embodiment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end your turn, add a random Upgraded Temporal card to your draw pile.

BlackRuseMod:Defy.NAME: Defy
BlackRuseMod:Defy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You are not affected by Weak, Vulnerable or Frail for 1 turn.
BlackRuseMod:Defy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You are not affected by Weak, Vulnerable or Frail for 1 turn. NL Retain.

BlackRuseMod:FanOfKnives.NAME: Fan of Knives
BlackRuseMod:FanOfKnives.DESCRIPTION: Throw 1 Knife at each enemy X times. NL Each deals !D! damage.

BlackRuseMod:FastForward.NAME: Fast Forward
BlackRuseMod:FastForward.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If there are no Attack cards in your hand, draw !M! cards.

BlackRuseMod:Ricochet.NAME: Ricochet
BlackRuseMod:Ricochet.DESCRIPTION: Throw 1 Knife. NL It deals !D! damage and bounces between enemies !M! times.

BlackRuseMod:FlawlessForm.NAME: Flawless Form
BlackRuseMod:FlawlessForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Protection. NL You are not affected by Weak, Vulnerable or Frail.
BlackRuseMod:FlawlessForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Protection. NL You are not affected by Weak, Vulnerable or Frail. NL Retain.

BlackRuseMod:FloweringNight.NAME: Flowering Night
BlackRuseMod:FloweringNight.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, draw a card. NL You may only draw NL !M! cards each turn NL this way.

BlackRuseMod:Initiator.NAME: Initiator
BlackRuseMod:Initiator.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add Follow Up NL to your hand.
BlackRuseMod:Initiator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add Follow Up+ NL to your hand.

BlackRuseMod:FollowUp.NAME: Follow Up
BlackRuseMod:FollowUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add Follow Up 2 NL to your hand. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
BlackRuseMod:FollowUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add Follow Up 2+ NL to your hand. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

BlackRuseMod:FollowUp2.NAME: Follow Up 2
BlackRuseMod:FollowUp2.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add Finishing Touch NL to your hand. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
BlackRuseMod:FollowUp2.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add Finishing Touch+ NL to your hand. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

BlackRuseMod:FinishingTouch.NAME: Finishing Touch
BlackRuseMod:FinishingTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Elegance. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

BlackRuseMod:Hightail.NAME: Hightail
BlackRuseMod:Hightail.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Protection NL X times. NL Backlash.

BlackRuseMod:Advance.NAME: Advance
BlackRuseMod:Advance.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! Cost 0 cards from your draw pile into your hand.
BlackRuseMod:Advance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put !M! Cost 0 cards from your draw pile into your hand.

BlackRuseMod:ForgedInTime.NAME: Forge in Time
BlackRuseMod:ForgedInTime.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Gain !M! Protection and 2 Knives for each exhausted card. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:Gouge.NAME: Gouge
BlackRuseMod:Gouge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Blight X times. NL Exhaust.
BlackRuseMod:Gouge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Blight X+1 times. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:BestPractice.NAME: Best Practice
BlackRuseMod:BestPractice.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you may upgrade 1 card in your hand for the rest of combat.

BlackRuseMod:Exchange.NAME: Exchange
BlackRuseMod:Exchange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! cards. NL Obtain !M! Knives. NL Retain.

BlackRuseMod:KidneyShot.NAME: Kidney Shot
BlackRuseMod:KidneyShot.DESCRIPTION: Throw !M! Knives. NL Each deals !D! damage and applies 1 Weak.

BlackRuseMod:WasteNot.NAME: Waste Not
BlackRuseMod:WasteNot.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, spend all [B] . NL Draw 1 more card next turn for each [B] spent.

BlackRuseMod:KillingDoll.NAME: Killing Doll
BlackRuseMod:KillingDoll.DESCRIPTION: Throw ALL Knives. NL Each deals !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:Collapse.NAME: Collapse
BlackRuseMod:Collapse.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your current Protection to ALL enemies.

BlackRuseMod:Manipulate.NAME: Manipulate
BlackRuseMod:Manipulate.DESCRIPTION: Adds X+1 random Temporal cards to your draw pile.
BlackRuseMod:Manipulate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Adds X+2 random Temporal cards to your draw pile.

BlackRuseMod:Misdirection.NAME: Misdirect
BlackRuseMod:Misdirection.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Blight and Weak.

BlackRuseMod:MoonPhase.NAME: Moon Phase
BlackRuseMod:MoonPhase.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block for each stack of Weak, Vulnerable and Frail on you.

BlackRuseMod:Moonlight.NAME: Moonlight
BlackRuseMod:Moonlight.DESCRIPTION: Throw !M! Knives. NL Each deals !D! damage and applies 1 Vulnerable.

BlackRuseMod:BottledTime.NAME: Bottled Time
BlackRuseMod:BottledTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:MurderousAura.NAME: Murderous Aura
BlackRuseMod:MurderousAura.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply 1 Blight to ALL enemies.
BlackRuseMod:MurderousAura.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, apply 1 Blight to ALL enemies.

BlackRuseMod:Read.NAME: Read
BlackRuseMod:Read.DESCRIPTION: Vision: Gain !B! Protection and apply !M! Weak.

BlackRuseMod:DancingSilver.NAME: Dancing Silver
BlackRuseMod:DancingSilver.DESCRIPTION: Convert !M! Knives to Satellites. NL Gain 2 Block for each Satellite you have.

BlackRuseMod:Potential.NAME: Potential
BlackRuseMod:Potential.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shift: Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat and put this card into NL your hand.

BlackRuseMod:Desolation.NAME: Desolation
BlackRuseMod:Desolation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double the NL enemy's Blight. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:Deadline.NAME: Deadline
BlackRuseMod:Deadline.DESCRIPTION: Vision: Apply !M! Blight and Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:RealityMarble.NAME: Reality Marble
BlackRuseMod:RealityMarble.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! card. NL The card you retained loses Ethereal this combat.
BlackRuseMod:RealityMarble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! cards. NL The cards you retain lose Ethereal this combat.

BlackRuseMod:Replace.NAME: Replace
BlackRuseMod:Replace.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card from your draw pile. NL Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

BlackRuseMod:Reset.NAME: Reset
BlackRuseMod:Reset.DESCRIPTION: Clear ALL Weak, Vulnerable and Frail. NL Each stack gives you !M! Protection. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:ReturningBlade.NAME: Returning Blade
BlackRuseMod:ReturningBlade.DESCRIPTION: Vision: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and put this card NL into your hand. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

BlackRuseMod:Shuttle.NAME: Shuttle
BlackRuseMod:Shuttle.DESCRIPTION: Activate card and relic effects that will activate at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:Rewind.NAME: Rewind
BlackRuseMod:Rewind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put the card at the bottom of your discard pile into NL your hand.

BlackRuseMod:Sabotage.NAME: Sabotage
BlackRuseMod:Sabotage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses NL that much Strength for 1 turn. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:ShiftingGears.NAME: Shifting Gears
BlackRuseMod:ShiftingGears.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Shift: Gain 1 Elegance.

BlackRuseMod:ShatteredReality.NAME: Shattered Reality
BlackRuseMod:ShatteredReality.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shift: Deal DOUBLE damage to ALL enemies.

BlackRuseMod:SilverMatrix.NAME: Silver Matrix
BlackRuseMod:SilverMatrix.DESCRIPTION: Convert !M! Knives to Satellites. NL Gain 1 Matrix for each Satellite you have.

BlackRuseMod:SilverBlades.NAME: Silver Blades
BlackRuseMod:SilverBlades.DESCRIPTION: Knives deal !M! additional damage. NL At the start NL of your turn, NL obtain !M! Knives.

BlackRuseMod:Snipe.NAME: Snipe
BlackRuseMod:Snipe.DESCRIPTION: Vision: Throw 1 Knife. NL It deals !D! damage and applies !M! Vulnerable.

BlackRuseMod:Solidify.NAME: Solidify
BlackRuseMod:Solidify.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 Temporal card and place it on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
BlackRuseMod:Solidify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 Temporal card twice and place it on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:SoulSculpture.NAME: Soul Sculpture
BlackRuseMod:SoulSculpture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL 6 times. NL Enemy loses NL !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:SpecialFormula.NAME: Special Formula
BlackRuseMod:SpecialFormula.DESCRIPTION: Gain [B] . NL Heal !M! HP. NL Backlash. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:Spin.NAME: Spin
BlackRuseMod:Spin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Backlash.

BlackRuseMod:StarChef.NAME: Star Chef
BlackRuseMod:StarChef.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you may exhaust 1 card and gain [B] . NL Ethereal.
BlackRuseMod:StarChef.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you may exhaust 1 card and gain [B] .

BlackRuseMod:Starlight.NAME: Starlight
BlackRuseMod:Starlight.DESCRIPTION: Throw !M! Knives. NL Each deals !D! damage to a random enemy and draws 1 card.

BlackRuseMod:Foresight.NAME: Foresight
BlackRuseMod:Foresight.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, look at the NL top !M! cards of NL your draw pile. NL You may discard NL any of them.

BlackRuseMod:Sunlight.NAME: Sunlight
BlackRuseMod:Sunlight.DESCRIPTION: Throw 1 Knife. NL It deals !D! damage NL and applies !M! Blight NL to ALL enemies.

BlackRuseMod:SuppressingFire.NAME: Suppressing Fire
BlackRuseMod:SuppressingFire.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you throw or convert a Knife, gain !M! Block.

BlackRuseMod:TimeTheft.NAME: Time Theft
BlackRuseMod:TimeTheft.DESCRIPTION: Vision: Gain [B] [B] . NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
BlackRuseMod:TimeTheft.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Vision: Gain [B] [B] [B] . NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:TemporalDefense.NAME: T. Defend
BlackRuseMod:TemporalDefense.DESCRIPTION: Temporal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Protection.

BlackRuseMod:TemporalEssence.NAME: T. Essence
BlackRuseMod:TemporalEssence.DESCRIPTION: Temporal. NL Gain [B] . NL Draw !M! cards.
BlackRuseMod:TemporalEssence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Temporal. NL Gain [B] [B] . NL Draw !M! cards.

BlackRuseMod:TemporalMisd.NAME: T. Misdirect
BlackRuseMod:TemporalMisd.DESCRIPTION: Temporal. NL Apply !M! Blight and Weak to ALL enemies.

BlackRuseMod:TemporalSlicing.NAME: T. Slice
BlackRuseMod:TemporalSlicing.DESCRIPTION: Temporal. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times to ALL enemies.

BlackRuseMod:TheWorld.NAME: The World
BlackRuseMod:TheWorld.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL The next card you play this turn costs 0. Exhaust.

BlackRuseMod:Contraction.NAME: Contraction
BlackRuseMod:Contraction.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Protection. NL Convert all Block to Protection.

BlackRuseMod:TimeWarp.NAME: Time Warp
BlackRuseMod:TimeWarp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard !M! card. NL Shift: Draw 1 card.
BlackRuseMod:TimeWarp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard !M! cards. NL Shift: Draw 1 card.

BlackRuseMod:Revamp.NAME: Revamp
BlackRuseMod:Revamp.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your discard pile into your hand and upgrade it. NL Exhaust.
BlackRuseMod:Revamp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your discard pile into your hand and upgrade it.

BlackRuseMod:TrueSight.NAME: True Sight
BlackRuseMod:TrueSight.DESCRIPTION: Vision effects will always be triggered.
BlackRuseMod:TrueSight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Vision effects will always be triggered. NL Retain.

BlackRuseMod:Unruled.NAME: Unruled
BlackRuseMod:Unruled.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each stack of Weak, Vulnerable and Frail on you, deal !M! additional damage.

BlackRuseMod:LightFlow.NAME: Light Flow
BlackRuseMod:LightFlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL 3 times. NL Backlash.
